item.title: I'm stumped
item.dc:creator: @xray_veeo xray veeo
item.description:
@xray_veeo wrote:

oops, i caught your error:

case 9192:
      if (c.interfaceEffect == 5 && c.playerHasItem(995, 5000000)) {
                            c.addItem(553, 10000);
                            c.addItem(554, 10000);
                            c.addItem(555, 10000);
                            c.addItem(556, 10000);
                            c.addItem(557, 10000);
                            c.addItem(558, 10000);
                            c.addItem(559, 10000);
                            c.addItem(560, 10000);
                            c.addItem(561, 10000);
                            c.addItem(562, 10000);
                            c.addItem(563, 10000);
                            c.addItem(564, 10000);
                            c.addItem(565, 10000);
                            c.addItem(566, 10000);
c.deleteItem(995, c.getItemSlot(995), 50000000);
                            c.sM("You Spend 50m On 10k Of Every Rune!");
      } else {
c.sM("You Don't Have Enough Money For That");
}
      break;

need another parenthesis

item.title: I'm stumped
item.dc:creator: @xray_veeo xray veeo
item.description:
@xray_veeo wrote:

i made this command called ::runes but instead of adding runes it sends a frame giving you a choice on how many you want to buy, and how much you want to pay…heres the problem…you can buy them with no cash…
heres my code.

case 9192:
		if (c.interfaceEffect == 5) {
                            c.addItem(553, 10000);
                            c.addItem(554, 10000);
                            c.addItem(555, 10000);
                            c.addItem(556, 10000);
                            c.addItem(557, 10000);
                            c.addItem(558, 10000);
                            c.addItem(559, 10000);
                            c.addItem(560, 10000);
                            c.addItem(561, 10000);
                            c.addItem(562, 10000);
                            c.addItem(563, 10000);
                            c.addItem(564, 10000);
                            c.addItem(565, 10000);
                            c.addItem(566, 10000);
c.deleteItem(995, c.getItemSlot(995), 50000000);
                            c.sM("You Spend 50m On 10k Of Every Rune!");
		} else {
c.sM("You Don't Have Enough Money For That");
}
		break;

i made up the else part but instead of saying you don’t have enough money it says else for the interface effect, because it doesn’t say if(playerHasITem(995 blah blah blah…so how do i make it so they can’t buy it when they’re broke?

-please help im trying this on my own and its the first time i’ve done anything like this.

Read full topic
